unnormalised: So, basically, if your neighbour's cow casually strolls onto your land and decides to munch on your prize-winning mango tree, Sec 35 of the Civil Procedure Code says you can sue for damages, but good luck proving the cow *knew* it was a prize-winning tree, lol.
normalised: So, basically, if your neighbor's cow casually strolls onto your land and decides to munch on your prize-winning mango tree, Section thirty five of the Civil Procedure Code says you can sue for damages, but good luck proving the cow knew it was a prize-winning tree, laugh out loud.
